def solve(arr):
    cnt = 0
    arr.sort()
    while(arr[2]<(arr[0]+arr[1])):
               arr[0]-=1
               arr[1]-=1
               cnt+=1
    return cnt+arr[0]+arr[1]

def solve(arr):
    largest = max(arr)
    all = sum(arr)
    
    return all//2 if largest <= all - largest else all - largest

def solve(arr):
    return min(sum(arr) - max(arr), sum(arr) // 2)

def solve(arr):
    return sum(arr)-max(arr) if max(arr)>sum(arr)-max(arr) else sum(arr)//2

def solve(arr):
    arr.sort()
    days = min(arr[1] + arr[0], arr[2])
    otherDays = (arr[0] + arr[1] + arr[2]) // 2
    if arr[1] + arr[0] - arr[2] < 0:
        return days
    return otherDays
